summary: Player Home on very small island, Just a stones throw from Robber\'s Gorge..Room for Followers..
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Now has a basement with crafting tools, I made the pier go across the lake so no need for the boat which I was having problems with..Lots of outdoor lighting and a new place for your horse..Added a few things to the house Like Picutes and Plants, Lokir and Roggvir live in the Basement, They were cut short in the game so I let their Ghost haunt the Basement, They keep an eye on the house since I\'m hardly ever there they will stay in the basement...

This is a player home, Its near Robber\'s Gorge, It has three bedrooms so you have room for your companions, It has a Pier to fish from or just sit on, You can either Fast travel their, Swim, or Use your row boat, Your horse has its own island to rest on, Great Location To grab a nap while on the road, Grab some food, Leave or pick up followers, Will be adding more later, Some crafting stuff, A forge, Workbence ect...

No known conflicts yet, If you have any problems please let me know and I will fix them asap...
Requires Latest Version of Skyrim and Update..
Just download, Open, Drop file in Data File of Skyrim and your done...


Credits go to:
Thanks to Modders resource and the following:
PAINTINGS and FRAMES
modders resource for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim game
created by Artisanix 

YNSTBIH\'s  Rug Resources


=================
New Plants
=================

by Tamira

Yughues aka Nobiax (http://www.sharecg.com/pf/full_uploads.php?pf_user_name=yughues) for creating almost all of the original models and textures
Birdy (http://www.sharecg.com/pf/full_uploads.php?pf_user_name=birdy) for creating the decidious tree mesh.
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit..

If I have Forgotten someone please Let me know and I will post Credit A.S.A.P. Thankyou...
author: IceSpiders
